Title: Relates to masked harassment
Summary: Establishes masked harassment when a person wears a mask or other face covering that intentionally hides or conceals their face for the primary purpose of menacing or threatening another person or placing another person or group of persons in reasonable fear for their physical safety.
LawCode: Add ยง240.12, amd ยง240.30, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the crime of masked harassment and aggravated harassment
